title: Stick or twist: Will Eddie Jones change the England midfield again for the Rugby World Cup final?
text:
Saturday’s semi-final victory against New Zealand was just the 10th start that Manu Tuilagi has made under Eddie Jones. Five have come with 12 on his back with the remainder wearing 13.

Mercifully for England’s head coach, all of them have come in 2019, when the Rugby World Cup cycle has reached its all-important climax. There was always a sense that, if the explosive centre was even close to fit, he would be on the plane to Japan.

Tuilagi’s value has been accentuated by his significant influence on what have been arguably England’s most emphatic team performances since Jones arrived. Two of those have been at the World Cup, in the quarter-final win over Australia and the defeat of the All Blacks...
description: Saturday’s semi-final victory against New Zealand was just the 10th start that Manu Tuilagi has made under Eddie Jones.
